page.title: 04Huntley Quarry-Products
page.content:
Huntley Wood Quarry produces sand and gravel. It is sold within a 20-30 mile radius.
There are 3 grades of sand, concrete, asphalt and building sand. The sizes of gravel produced are 20mm, 14mm, 10mm and 6mm.
The plant is capable of producing 210 tonnes per hour but current output is less than capacity at 300,000 tonnes per annum.
The workforce comprises of 11. Most workers are local people. The specialists such as geologists and electricians work for ARC Western and cover several quarry sites.
